charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1101_010:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] was
walking along the beach.
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1101_020:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] heard someone shout excitedly and turned [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ]
head to find...
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_030: We lost?! Aw man... Well, we almost had you!
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_040: *chuckle* True. It was close up until the very end.
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_050:
Too close! How about we battle again and see
who wins this time!
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_0402_090:
Oh, hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Yep! I hope so anyway!
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_0402_100: Nessa and I just finished up a quick battle.
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_110:
But I wanna keep going! Next round, I’m positive
I’ll win!
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_120:
Hang on—haven’t you and Psyduck been training
since this morning, Misty?
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_130: Don’t you think it’s time for a break?
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_140:
No way! We’re totally fine. Let’s keep the
battles rolling!
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_0402_180:
Well...when you look at me like that,
I don’t know...
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_190: *sigh* All right, all right... Let’s take a break.
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_200:
I think that’s for the best. What’s got you in such
a hurry today anyway?
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_210:
You may have noticed during our battle, but my
Psyduck reeeally loves to loaf around.
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_220:
When we traveled around Kanto together, he was
always waddling at the back of the group.
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_230:
And you’re hoping a bit of extra training might
help him grow out of it?
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_240:
That’s the theory! Plus, he always tries his
very best...
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_250:
What kind of Trainer would I be if let him down
when he’s trying so hard? I couldn’t do that!
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_260:
I want us to keep getting stronger together, and
maybe one day I’ll get to see him waddle right
past the rest of the group!
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_270:
That’s so like you, Misty. Always wanting to take
care of others.
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_280:
Oh? Do you think Psyduck knows we’re talking
about him?
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_290:
Probably. I’m pretty sure he understands us for
the most part.
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_300:
So he likes to do things at his own pace, but he’s
actually a really hard worker... Maybe that noggin
of his is burning with energy we just can’t see!
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_310:
Maybe! What’s on the inside doesn’t have to match
the outside. You know, that kinda reminds me of
you in a way.
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_330:
You usually look so cool and composed, but once
you’re focused on a battle, it’s like nothing else
exists, right?
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_350:
See? You and Psyduck are more alike than
you think.
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_360:
I think you might be right... And now all I can
think about is helping Psyduck live his best life!
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_370:
I want to be there when he finally waddles past
the rest of the group!
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_0401_390:
Do you want to train with us, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_0402_410:
A second ago, you said we should take a break,
and now you want to help Psyduck train?
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_420:
All right! Why don’t the three of us have a
battle, then?
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_440:
Psyduck may still be in training, but he’s got a
whole lot of power hiding under that cute face!
charaepi_ch0110_00a_kasumi/2301_1201_450: Ready for a taste of his true strength?
